EmailTemplate.name: SubPool No Show (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
According to our records, you missed {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} on {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c}. Please visit https://imaginewa.org/become-a-substitute/ if you'd like to register for a different class.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
